閕字的基本解释

閕
xiā
门闭。

閕
xiǎ
古同“閜”，裂开。

閕字的汉语字典释义

[①]［xiǎ］
同“閜1”。
开阔貌；开裂貌。

閕字的康熙字典解释

【戌集上】【門字部】　閕； 康熙笔画：12； 页码：页1333第04
【集韻】虛加切，音煆。門閉也。　又魚駕切，音訝。開裂也。【司馬相如·上林賦】谽呀豁閕。【註】呵下反。豁閕，空虛也。

閕字的源字形

字形对比：

中国大陆宋体台湾细明体韩国明朝体
閕字的起名意思

暂无。

Basic explanation of words
Yi
xiā
The door closed.
Yi
xiǎ
The ancient same "suddenly", cracked.
Yi
Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①]［xiǎ］
Same as "閜1".
Open appearance; cracked appearance.
Yi
Kangxi dictionary interpretation of words
[Su Ji 1] [Door Character Department] 　閕; Kangxi Strokes: 12; Page Number: Page 1333 Page 04
[Jiyun] Adding the virtual and cutting, the sound is simmering. The door is closed.　Fish and cut again, the sound is surprised. Cracking also. 【Sima Xiangru·Shanglin Fu】Chen Ye Huo Rong. [Note] Oh, reverse it. Humiliation, emptiness.
